content: the 2nd single_crochet in both loops of the same st decrease to make the decrease insert your hook under the flo of each of the next 2 st indicated with the needles in the 1st photo below you will have 3 loops on your hook yo pull up a loop through both fl s you will have 2 loops on your hook yo pull through both loops on your hook stacked single_crochet i am using this method because it is neat and it has a v at the top of the st that i can single_crochet into at the end of the round feel free to use your preferred method to make the 1st double_crochet when each round is closed with a chain and single_crochet which counts as a ch2-space the hook is in the correct position to start the new round to make the stacked single_crochet insert the hook in the ch2-space below indicated with a needle in the 1st photo below and make a single_crochet as you normally would single_crochet again in the loop indicated in the 2nd photo below the stacked single_crochet counts as 1 double_crochet and it looks as shown in the 3rd photo below © tic-tac-toe egg game by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2024 3 invisible join thread the yarn end on a darning needle insert the needle from front to back under both top loops of the 1st st after the stacked single_crochet or starting chain if that was your preferred method then insert the needle from top to bottom between the loops of the last st which is a chain of the round and from front to back between the top loops of the starting st/chain see the photo below do not pull tight zipper stitch i suggest to watch this tutorial if you are unfamiliar with the zipper stitch https //youtu be/lt3yuaq6nbm surface crochet basically surface crochet is drawing/writing on your crochetwork with slip stitches the working yarn is at the back of your work stitches are made on the front of your work to start insert your hook between 2 st and pull up a loop to the front of your work 1 -insert your hook between the next 2 st 2 -pull up a loop through your work and through the loop on your hook repeat steps 1-2 crab stitch this is basically single_crochet worked in the opposite direction instead of inserting the hook in the next st to the left insert the hook in the next st to the right yo pull up a loop yo pull through both loops in the hook picot chain 3 slip_stitch in the 2 loops indicated by the needle in the photo below © tic-tac-toe egg game by yvonne van zijl @bokkyshome 2024 4 general the eggs these amigurumi are crocheted in continuous rounds mark the 1st st of each round with a stitch marker move that marker up with each round the granny squares these are crocheted in the round the chain
